VC.subject: Opportunity for Venture Capitalists
VC.message:
Hi [name],

We're excited to share a new opportunity with you that aligns with your interests in [company]. Please let us know if you would like more information.

Best,
The Team

Angel Investor.subject: Exclusive Investment Opportunity
Angel Investor.message:
Dear [name],

We believe we have an opportunity that matches your investment profile, particularly in startups like [company]. We're eager to discuss this further with you.

Warm regards,
The Team
